column.name: PROCESS_ROWS
column.comment: Number of Hash mark rows to process for vehicle counting

column.name: CROP_TOP
column.comment: Upper row to include in image

column.name: CROP_BOTTOM
column.comment: Lower row to include in image.

column.name: CROP_LEFT
column.comment: Left side column to include in image

column.name: CROP_RIGHT
column.comment: Right side column to include in image.

column.name: MAX_OBJECT_SIZE
column.comment: maximum number of pixels required for traffic object consideration

column.name: MIN_OBJECT_SIZE
column.comment: minimum number of pixels required for traffic object consideration

column.name: NUM_LANES
column.comment: number of lanes in the image

column.name: NUM_ROWS
column.comment: number of rows (depth of hashmarks) for processing

column.name: TRAFFIC_DIRECTION
column.comment: Direction that traffic is moving. North, etc

column.name: OBJECT_DESCRIPTION
column.comment: description of known/reference object in image

column.name: OBJECT_DISTANCE
column.comment: estimated distance of object from camera

column.name: CONFIG_FILENAME
column.comment: ltilib configuration and parameter file for this image

column.name: DESCRIPTOR_FILENAME
column.comment: dir & filename that holds geometric feature descriptors for this images hm and lanelines.

column.name: OCR_PROCESS
column.comment: There may be text in the processing area on the image, default F=false
